\n

jQuery UI removeClass

\n
\n

Overview

\n
\n
[edit]

removeClass( [class], [duration] )

\n

Removes all or specified class from each of the set of matched elements with an optional transition between the states.

\n
\n
\n

Dependencies

\n
    \n
  • Effects Core
    • \n
\n
\n
\n

Example

\n
\n
  • Demo
  • View Source
\n

\n Removes the class \'selected\' from the matched elements with a one second transition.
\n

\n 
$("p").click(function () {\n
      $(this).removeClass("selected", 1000);\n
    });\n
\n

\n

\n 
<!DOCTYPE html>\n
<html>\n
<head>\n
  <link type="text/css" href="http://jqueryui.com/latest/themes/base/ui.all.css" rel="stylesheet" />\n
  <script type="text/javascript" src="http://jqueryui.com/latest/jquery-1.3.2.js"></script>\n
  <script src="http://ui.jquery.com/latest/ui/effects.core.js"></script>\n
<style type="text/css">\n
  p { cursor: pointer; font-size: 1.2em; }\n
  .selected { color:red; }\n
</style>\n
  <script type="text/javascript">\n
  $(document).ready(function(){\n
    $("p").click(function () {\n
      $(this).removeClass("selected", 1000);\n
    });\n
  });\n
  </script>\n
</head>\n
<body style="font-size:62.5%;">\n
  \n
<p class="selected">Click me to remove \'selected\' class.</p>\n
<p class="selected">Click me to remove \'selected\' class.</p>\n
<p class="selected">Click me to remove \'selected\' class.</p>\n
\n
</body>\n
</html>\n
\n

\n

\n
\n
\n
\n

Arguments

\n
    \n \n
  • \n
    \n

    class

    \n
    \n
    Type:
    \n
    String
    \n \n
    Optional
    \n \n
    \n
    \n
    \n

    CSS classes to remove from the elements.

    \n
    \n
    • \n \n \n
  • \n
    \n

    duration

    \n
    \n
    Type:
    \n
    String, Number
    \n \n
    Optional
    \n \n
    \n
    \n
    \n

    A string representing one of the three predefined speeds ("slow", "normal", or "fast") or the number of milliseconds to run the animation (e.g. 1000).

    \n
